text: Kenneth Terence Solomon (born 8 October 1979), is the first-ever South African chess Grandmaster to get the title without reaching the required rating of 2500. He is currently the only Grandmaster from the country and second in Sub- Sahara. == References == == Other websites == * * *Kenny Solomon chess games at 365Chess.com Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Chess grandmasters Category:Sportspeople from Cape Town
title: Kenny Solomon
